mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( user_id, user_nickname, user_email, user_pwd, role_id, user_img_url, created_date, created_id, updated_date, updated_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userNickname}, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{roleId}, #{userImgUrl}, #{createdDate}, #{createdId}, #{updatedDate}, #{updatedId} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_user WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_user WHERE user_nickname = #{userNickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
